protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 500. ID_REF =  VALUE = MAS5.0 signal intensity ABS_CALL =  DETECTION P-VALUE =
Seedlings were grown under dark or red-light and long-day (0.5 Î¼mole m-2 sec-1) contitions for 4 days.
Seeds were surface sterilized and plated on 1/2 MS (0.8% agar, pH 5.7) plates.

Total RNA was isolated as described previously [(Chang et al, Plant J 54, 205 (2008)]. Polysome RNA was isolated through a sucrose gradient and purified with phenol/chloroform extraction, LiCl precipitation and dissolved in RNase-free H2O.
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 10 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 701021 Rev. 5, Affymetrix).
Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16.5 hr at 45C on GeneChip Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
GeneChips were scanned using Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G
